attributes.action: Force the resignation of Mayor Winter and investigate the poor services that Doncaster Council provide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Doncaster Council have recently been given a one star award by the audit commission for poor service in Doncaster.

Public service in Doncaster is appalling in general and an overhall of the Council is needed.

We the undersigned lobby the Government to take action and investigate 'all' Council services in Doncaster (from building contracts to the emptying of bins).

We will not sit back and let Mayor Winter and Doncaster Council to ruin our town any further.

rejection.details: We suggest you contact the local government ombudsman with your concerns.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
